channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: I have a SQL Source, and i need to execute the .sql file to the databse. So iv created a database called "server" And i do this on the mysql command line source C:/db.sql Then i get four erros saying database not found. How do i make it execute to my database?

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @gio2 gio2
item.description:
@gio2 wrote:

I have a SQL Source, and i need to execute the .sql file to the databse.
So iv created a database called “server” And i do this on the mysql command line
source C:/db.sql
Then i get four erros saying database not found. How do i make it execute to my database?

Read full topic
